# Problem 11.22 - By Superposition {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A cantilever beam is loaded as shown where L = 10 m, M = 50 kN-m, and F = 50 kN. Determine the magnitude of the deflection at the free end of the beam. Assume EI = 45000 kN-m<sup>2</sup>.
